title: marshmallow fluff logo
content:
Hi all,

Any thoughts on this logo? I'm looking for both "Marshmallow" and "fluff".

Thanks!  
ben

comments.content:
Yeah. Lovely Haley's [Teaspoon](http://web.archive.org/web/20150129011121/http:/www.kingdomofawesome.com/)!

Edit: I'm sorry, you are not looking for suggestions. My mistake.

For a free\* alternative, try my Fontstruction, the aptly named [Marshmallow Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150129011121/http:/fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructions/show/marshmallow_script).

- Lex

\*(free for non-commercial use, as long as I'm credited as the designer)
